title: TelephoneKeypadFont
content:
This is the keypad from a standard AT&T pushbutton telephone, circa 1980's. I haven't found anything close.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [TelephoneKeypad2500.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/typophile.com/files/TelephoneKeypad2500.jpg) | 803.28 KB |
author: HVB

comments.content:
Reminds me of [this previous discussion about Leroy Lettering machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/typophile.com/node/79271).  
May be you'll find some interesting alternatives in these suggestions: [Planscribe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/planscribe-nf), [Engineering Plot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.dafont.com/engineering-plot.font), [Leroy Lettering Light Beta 01](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.fontspace.com/character/leroyletteringlightbeta01), [Gravur Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/lineto.com/The%20Fonts/Font%20Categories/Text%20Fonts/Gravur%20Condensed), [Rendering](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/rendering), [Simpliciter Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larstornqvist/simpliciter-sans), [Gordon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/gordon/), [Register Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/btn/register-sans-btn), [Primer Print](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/primer-print), [Report](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/report), [Oxymoron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bedoodle/oxymoron), [TGL 0-16](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200021/http:/www.dafont.com/tgl-0-16.font)
And I even made my own with a Leroy set and ScanFont a few years ago - good list Ryuk.
